column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After watching Naruto for sometime
column2: I began craving the Ramen he always ate. I yelped a few locations and decided to check JINYA out. I am so glad I came here first. Walked in around 1500
column4: and seated immediately. Hanza (sorry if I got your name wrong) was our server was great. I wasnt sure what to get my toddler
column5: as the bowls we large and he recommended the kids meal
column6: which came with a little bit of everything. Needless today my toddler loved it and went straight for the sweets first. As for our food
column7: it was yummy and so filling. Aside from the cup ramen
column8: I don't have much of a comparison but I feel strongly that this must be what Naruto's Â Ichiraku is like.
